#summary The objects in use by the front- and back-ends

{{{
Topic (dom: TopicList)
  title
  start
  end
  color
  bounds: {
    n:
    s:
    e:
    w:
  }
  
Event (dom: does not appear)
  uid
  start
  end
  color (inherits)
  location [text]
  title
  
  getOverlays()
  show()
  hide()

Marker (dom: LabeledMarker)
  title (inherits)
  lat
  lng
  blurb
  icon
  
  onOff: label with title and icon
  onOver: showBlurb(), bringTOFront()
  onClick: (showDetailedBlurb())
 
Polygon
  coords [Array of (lat,lng pairs)
  color (inherits)
  borderColor (computed?)
  title (inherits)
  
  onOff: show polygon
  onOver: showLabel()
  

}}}
